title: Financial Management roles and permissions
content:
There are specific roles associated with financial management and its components. Service Management uses permissions based on roles for task alignment with your assigned role. The tenant administrator manages and assigns these permissions.

The following role is by default assigned to Financial Management.

Role Responsibilities
Financial Manager
  • Able to add, edit, or delete budget lines in projects, programs, or portfolios
  • Able to add or edit cost allocation rules
  • Able to create or view expense lines
  • Maintains the budget type list
  • Maintains the financial metadata, including the financial calendar and chart of accounts
  • Maintains the virtual financial organization and objects, including cost centers and cost types, budget centers and budget types

Review the individual permission assignments for each role in Administration > Master Data > People > Roles.
